issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1.Base UI > nav group
2.tap "well look at this"
3.tap "close Nav"
4.tap "open nav group"
5.Tap "tweetdeck is cool"
6.Close nav
repeat quickly until crash (3g and iphone4)

results: 
Tue Apr 26 16:40:08 unknown KitchenSink[3606] <Error>: KitchenSink(3606,0xaaf000) malloc: *** error for object 0x5003c00: non-page-aligned, non-allocated pointer being freed
*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug
Tue Apr 26 16:40:08 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0xf58b][3606] <Notice>: KitchenSink(3606,0xaaf000) malloc: *** error for object 0x5003c00: non-page-aligned, non-allocated pointer being freed
Tue Apr 26 16:40:08 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0xf58b][3606] <Notice>: *** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug
fields.summary: iOS: crash when navigating through navgroup
fields.environment: INFO Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (04/26/11 11:54 6b80fd9...), iphone3 (3.1.3), iphone4 (4.3.2) ipod touch4GT (4.1)

comments.body: Does not occur on iPhone 3GS iOS 3.1.2, iPad (3.2.2), iPod 3rd gen (4.0.2), iPod 4th gen (4.1) or iPhone 4 VZW (4.2.6)
